sentences.en: Before dawn, Perseus – radiant point of the Perseid meteor shower – is close to overhead.
sentences.cn: 在拂晓之前, 英仙座流星雨的辐射点—英仙座将上升至我们头顶的天空的顶端.

sentences.en: Both Perseus and Cassiopeia are considered circumpolar from northerly latitudes.
sentences.cn: 英仙座和仙后座在北半球被称为”拱极星“.

sentences.en: Both Perseus and Cassiopeia are considered to be circumpolar from northerly latitudes.
sentences.cn: 英仙星座和仙后座从北纬角度来考虑,被认为是“周极星”.

sentences.en: Greek mythology a woman transformed into a Gorgon by Athena ; she was slain by Perseus.
sentences.cn: 希腊神话)让雅典娜变为蛇发女怪的女子,后为珀尔修斯所杀.

sentences.en: James Bond is the Hercules or Perseus of the modern age.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯邦德是大力神,是现代的帕尔修斯.

sentences.en: Perseus , favored by Minerva and Mercury, set out against the Gorgon.
sentences.cn: 珀尔修斯在密涅瓦和墨丘利的庇护下出发去征服这蛇发女妖.

sentences.en: Perseus could fight against Medusa for Andromeda.
sentences.cn: 波秀士(英仙座)为保护安卓米达(仙女座)对抗曼杜莎.

sentences.en: Perseus is fainter than Cassiopeia and its stars are not so easy to identify.
sentences.cn: 英仙座要比仙后座暗,因此英仙座并不是很容易辨认.

sentences.en: Perseus the Hero follows Cassiopeia across the night sky.
sentences.cn: 英仙座紧随仙后座之后.

sentences.en: Perseus: Someones got to make a stand!
sentences.cn: 珀尔修斯: 但总得有人挺身而出!

sentences.en: Show me how to punish Perseus for this blasphemy!
sentences.cn: 告诉我怎么才能惩罚珀修斯因为他的亵渎!

sentences.en: The hero is Perseus, called a demi-god, because his father is Zeus the god, while his mother a human.
sentences.cn: 我们的主角是珀尔修斯，他是一个半人神，因为他的爸爸是一个神，宙斯，而他的妈妈是一个人。

sentences.en: The Perseus Nebula can be as the large green cloudthe center of the image.
sentences.cn: 位于图像正中的是大型的绿色英仙座星云.

trans.tran_cn: <希神>珀尔修斯（宙斯之子，杀女怪 Medusa 的英雄），英仙座
珀尔休斯（希腊主神宙斯之女，杀死怪 Medusa 的英雄）
trans.tran_en: a son of Zeus and Danae, who with Athena's help slew the Gorgon Medusa and rescued Andromeda from a sea monster
